alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Montgomery; Pulaski (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:14PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN PULASKI...NORTHWESTERN FLOYD AND MONTGOMERY COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RADFORD THROUGH 200 PM EDT... At 113 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walton to near Allisonia. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Blacksburg... Christiansburg... Radford... Dublin... Pilot... Allisonia... and Claytor Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
